attributes.action: Ban all vehicles over 10 years old to reduce traffic congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ban every single vehicle over 10 years old to reduce traffic congestion and air pollution, with as few exceptions as possible.
Presenting the public with a choice to either take up walking, utilise public transport, cycle or purchase new vehicles with cleaner and more efficient engines.
The necessary data is available from DVLA and the Ministry of Transport.  It should not cost the tax payer a kings ransom to implement.  Simply impound vehicles at the due date.

Classic cars belong in museums - keep them there.  Restrict their use to organised events in parks, private estates and race tracks.  
Do not permit use on the open road.
